page.title: 08ST PATRICK'S JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is a junior school. It takes children aged 7 to 11. There are about 160 children in it in four groups. There are 7 teachers, Mr Young, the Head master, Miss Campbell the Deputy Head who teaches first years , Mrs. Burrow teaches second years, Mrs. Murray and Mrs. Mitchell teach third years ,Mrs de Cordova and Mr Rudd teach fourth years.Our school is a dump it's really old fashioned. It used to be a senior school .It has a hall, a kitchen, a music room, cloakrooms, boys and girls toilets, a library and 8 classrooms. Nearly every thing is old fashioned but recently we have been getting some new desk tops, pictures and pinboards. We have a school uniform but it only started last year it is green jumper white blouse or skirt and grey skirt or trousers. turn to page 9.
